perturbation.original_text: CUSTOMERS means all users who access Co-Branded Site.
perturbation.changed_text:
"CUSTOMERS" means all users who access Co-Branded Site.

(d) "SITE VISITORS" means all users who access Co-Branded Site.
perturbation.explanation: The original definition of 'CUSTOMERS' is directly contradicted by the addition of a near-identical definition for 'SITE VISITORS', creating uncertainty as to whether these terms are interchangeable, similar, or distinct. This introduces confusion regarding obligations and rights associated with each group.

perturbation.original_text: After Launch Date, i-Escrow shall pay 2TheMart advertising fees based on the number of Transaction Inquiries. This advertising fees shall consist of a per Transaction Inquiry amount calculated by multiplying 0.025% by the amount of the average Transaction from all Customers in the preceding quarter. The formula for arriving at the per Transaction Inquiry amount may be revised from time to time during the term of this Agreement to reflect present market conditions ("the Adjusted Rate"), but only by mutual consent of the parties after good faith discussions.
perturbation.changed_text: After Launch Date, i-Escrow shall pay 2TheMart advertising fees based on the number of Transaction Inquiries. This advertising fees shall consist of a per Transaction Inquiry amount calculated by multiplying 0.025% by the amount of the average Transaction from all Customers in the preceding quarter. The formula for arriving at the per Transaction Inquiry amount may be revised from time to time during the term of this Agreement to reflect present market conditions ("the Negotiated Rate"), at the sole discretion of I-Escrow.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause states that the "Adjusted Rate" can only be revised by mutual consent. The modified version changes "Adjusted Rate" to "Negotiated Rate" and then states that the rate can be revised at the sole discretion of I-Escrow, creating a direct contradiction and uncertainty about how fees are adjusted.

perturbation.original_text: 8.1 TERM.  The term of this Agreement shall continue for one (1) year following the Launch Date, unless earlier terminated as provided herein. This Agreement may be renewed for any number of successive one (1) year terms by mutual written agreement of the parties prior to the conclusion of the term of this Agreement.  A party wishing to renew this Agreement shall give the other party notice thereof no less than thirty (30) days before the expiration of the term then in effect.  In the event that either party does not give such notice, the term of this Agreement shall be automatically renewed for another one (1) year.
perturbation.changed_text: 8.1 TERM. The term of this Agreement shall continue for one (1) year following the Launch Date, unless earlier terminated as provided herein. This Agreement may be renewed for any number of successive one (1) year terms at the discretion of I-Escrow prior to the conclusion of the term of this Agreement. A party wishing to renew this Agreement shall give the other party notice thereof no less than thirty (30) days before the expiration of the term then in effect. In the event that I-Escrow does not give such notice, the term of this Agreement shall be automatically renewed for another one (1) year.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that the agreement may be renewed by mutual written agreement, but in the modified text the agreement may be renewed at the discretion of I-Escrow. Furthermore the agreement is automatically renewed after 1 year if I-Escrow does not give notice, however it was previously said that the renewal occurs at the discretion of I-Escrow. The renewal process is now uncertain.
